entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 5:42 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 6.
